title: jacks_hideout
nomap: You don't know your way around this area yet. You'll have to navigate on foot.

events.title: When the Raccoon Comes Home
events.subtitle: You are passing near Jack's hideout late at night when you distantly pick up on a hideous screeching, wailing sound. You freeze, suspecting some sort of horrible wraith or a magical assault on your senses. After a few moments, however, you begin to decipher words and lyrics in the noise. Someone with negative singing ability is slurring and yelling their way through a song. You manage to make out "when the woooolf comes hooome" before you realise it is Jack, and he sounds blackout drunk.

events.title: Travel West back to the rocky passage
events.subtitle: You remember the path Jack showed you that will keep you hidden as you move.

success.text: You climb up out of the hideout, and clamber over the rocks before dropping back down into the passage.

events.title: Thief Training (Repeat)
events.subtitle: Jack can't wait to start training his "newbie"

grizzsex.text: Your training starts immediately. First, Jack has you try to walk across his hideout without making any noise. It doesn't seem too hard, but the random clothes and objects secretly conceal a large amount of bells and jangly keychains that he's hidden underneath. He teaches you how to carefully place your feet, lifting and pressing them down in such a way so they don't move anything or make noise, but still let you move quickly. As you practice, your feet start to grow soft, dark fur. Your toes lengthen, and you feel claws grow from the ends, and your soles toughen and darken as black pads cover them completely. With your new feet, you seem to be able to place your steps more carefully, to stretch your toes and put your claws down where they will make the least noise. events.title: Ask Jack how he gets here from Horn
events.subtitle: Hornloft prison is widely considered inescapable. The armed guards, absurdly remote location, and magical security devices meant that you only managed to get out due to your unique physiology, based on advice from some sort of weird bat entity. How does an ordinary racoon manage it?

grizzsex.text:
Jack is playing dominoes with his stolen coins when you broach the subject. He chuckles and flicks one of the coins standing on its edge, which sets off a chain cascade that leaves them all jingling and rolling off the table, onto a pile of socks. "That's easy, mate. I'm a master thief. I can go anywhere I like", he says.

You are slightly sceptical of this claim, based on his current living conditions being a muddy hole in the ground stuffed with dirty clothes. He notices you glance around and crosses his arms. "Hey, I live here cos I want to. I could pilfer the keys to some fancy mansion in Gran Campion if I wanted, but who wants to live with a bunch of nobs? This place has everything I need! Back in the day, you should have seen the heists we pulled. Me and...well, anyway." He scratches his chin and then grins more, his eyes widening as he has a thought.

"Tell you what mate, I just had a great idea for your training. I can give you some hints and pointers on the secrets at that prison, but first, you gotta prove yourself worthy of the master thief lifestyle!", He says. He grabs your hand and pulls you over to a lopsided set of drawers, with one side panel wobbling loose. He pulls open the top drawer, and you cover your nose slightly from the stink of musty, dirty male paws that oozes from within. He adjusts his pants and gropes himself a bit.

"I got everything in here, except Horn guards. Those damn gryphons don't wear anything on their feet. My collector's pride is at stake! You get me some socks from Horn law enforcement, and I'll see about extending your training."

npcs.name: Jack

"Don't think of it as being a thief. It's more like an unlicensed road tax collector, and cleanup crew for things stupid suckers leave lying around!"

Jack grins widely as he pulls down his pants, letting his cock flop out into the air. Despite his short stature, his cock is hefty and thick, and it bounces over his musky, furry balls as it hardens.
